content:
Certainly! Here's a table summarizing the services I am offering along with their corresponding prices:

| Service | Price per business |
| --- | --- |
| Content provided by you | $150 |
| Thumbnail | $150 |
| Caption | $150 |
| Hashtags | $150 |
| Scheduling | $150 |
| Social Media Automation | $89.5 |
| Designing of regular social media posts | $89.5 |
| Copywriting | $89.5 |

Please note that the total cost for the base package with add-ons is $239.5 per business, and the total cost for all services offered is $283 per business per month.

I hope this table helps provide a clear summary of the services and pricing I am offering. If you have any questions or concerns, please don't hesitate to reach out.
